description: chocolate pot, silver with wood handle
inscription:
Inscription

-Engraved on the body with the arms and crest of (?) Taylour of Westminster (granted February 1714-15).  The underside of the body engraved:
   Presented to John Crosby by the Directors of General Mills, Inc. in Gratitude and    Appreciation of Sixty Years of Distinguished Service and Wise Counsel as a    member of the Board of Directors of Washburn Crosby Company and General    Mills, Inc. 1889-1949.
markings:
Mark

on base: [Presented to John Crosby by the Directors of General Mills Inc., in Gratitude and Appreciation of Sixty Years of Distinguished Service and Wise Counsel as a member of the Board of Director\'s of Washburn Crosby Company and General, Mills Inc. 1889-1949]

Fully marked (Britannia standard) on side of body near upper handle socket.
title: Chocolate pot
